author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-All About to offer off-floor distribution of shares
text:
March 8 (Reuters) - All About Inc
* Says it will offer an off-floor distribution of 676,000 shares of its stock at the price of 1,184 yen per share, on the Tokyo Stock Exchange on March 9
* Says the limitation for distribution is up to 10,000 shares for each customer
Source text in Japanese: goo.gl/qz6srq
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
